content: We challenged DALL-E to create an image of a Ferrari sports car speeding through a futuristic city in a cyberpunk style.
And wow, just look at what we received - an incredible first draft that truly captures the essence of speed and innovation!
But let's be real - we know we can take this to the next level! So, let's roll up our sleeves and dive into some exciting editing and refinement to make this masterpiece shine even brighter!
First up: colors! Let's add bright shades that stand out on the canvas, making our image eye-catching and grabbing the viewer's attention like never before.

title: Enhancing Colors
instruction: Fill in the gaps to make the image more colorful.

content:
Awesome! We've got a vibrant image now.

Let's pump up the excitement by adjusting the size to perfectly fit our needs!

title: Adjusting the Size
instruction: Fill in the gaps to change the size of the image.

content: Don't you think that if you change the position of a yellow logo a little to the back, it might enhance the composition?
However, DALL-E will change the whole picture when you enter the prompt, and we don't want to change the whole picture.
So we have another solution. Using the select function, which opens when you zoom in on the image, select the object's position in the image, and ask DALL-E to add some detail there.

title: Changing the Position
instruction: Fill in the gaps to change the position of an object in the image.

content: All right, now let's change the background a little bit to make it even more interesting. Adding a themed background can completely transform the feel of your image.

title: Changing the Background
instruction: Fill in the gaps to change the background of the image.

content:
Amazing! You've just learned how to enhance colors, adjust sizes, reposition elements, and change backgrounds to refine your DALL-E images.

Now, it is time to test your knowledge!

question: Why is the prompt "Create an image of a Ferrari sports car speeding through a futuristic city in a cyberpunk style" considered effective?

options.text: It includes specific details about the subject, action, style, and composition
It describes the car's color but lacks details about the setting and style

explanation: The correct answer highlights the importance of providing detailed information about the subject, action, style, and composition to help DALL-E create a vivid image.

question: How does enhancing colors to make them more vibrant and eye-catching affect the overall image?

options.text: It makes the image more visually appealing and grabs the viewer's attention

explanation: Enhancing colors makes the image more visually appealing and grabs the viewer's attention. Vibrant colors can make an image stand out and be more engaging.

question: Why might you choose to resize an image to a 1:1 aspect ratio?

options.text: To create a square image that fits well on various social media platforms

explanation: Resizing to a 1:1 aspect ratio creates a square image that fits well on various social media platforms. Square images are versatile and commonly used online.

question: When changing the position of an object in an image, why might you use the select function instead of entering a new prompt?

options.text: To avoid altering the entire image and focus on adjusting a specific element
To refine the placement while maintaining the overall composition

explanation: The select function allows you to avoid altering the entire image and focus on adjusting a specific element. This helps in making precise changes without starting over.

content:
Great job on mastering this lesson! 

Next up, weâ€™ll dive into color theory to take your images to the next level. See you there!
